title: McDonnell Douglas DC-10 and MD-11 Aircraft
summary: This AD applies to McDonnell Douglas DC-10 series, MD-10 series, and MD-11 series aircraft. It addresses safety concerns related to aircraft systems and requires specific inspections or modifications.

title: Airbus A320 and A321 Family Aircraft - Structural Inspections
summary: This AD applies to certain Airbus A320 and A321 family aircraft. It addresses structural integrity concerns and may exclude aircraft with certain production modifications already incorporated.

excluded_if_modifications.description: Production modification 24591 - if incorporated at production, AD does not apply
Service Bulletin A320-57-1089 (any revision) - if applied, AD does not apply
Production modification 24977 - if incorporated at production, AD does not apply
